title: Vikram Vedha Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Vikram Vedha Songs Lyrics
Casts: R. Madhavan, Vijay Sethupathi,
Music: Sam C. S.
Direction : Pushkar-Gayathri

After "Oram Po" and "Va" Pushkar-Gayathri next is Vikram Vedha featuring Madhavan and Vijaysethupathi. Both Madhavan and Vijay Sethupathi has catpured fans in their recent movies. Hoping the combo of these two would be a good movie.
